description: This file is a BitBake include (.inc) recipe file used to build and configure the pseudo utility within a Yocto-based embedded Linux build system. It defines build steps, dependencies, compilation options, and installation procedures for the pseudo package, which provides fake root capabilities for user-space testing and development.

methods.name: do_configure
methods.description: Placeholder for configuration step, currently does nothing.

methods.name: maybe_make32
methods.description: Determines whether to build 32-bit libraries based on system architecture and configuration flags, and warns if necessary.

methods.name: warn_32bit_missing
methods.description: Outputs warnings if 32-bit stubs are missing when required for 32-bit build support.
